description:
In this course titled 'NLP- Create Instant Rapport Using Hypnotic Handshake' By Pradeep Aggarwal , you will learn -

Handshake is one of the first steps when you interact with anyone. Every few people know that handshake can actually define a person’s characteristics. A firm and confident handshake can build an instant rapport and a lasting relation.

This course is designed to help you create an instant rapport with anyone by simply using a gesture called ‘Handshake.’

By the end of the course you will be able to build rapport instantly with people at social gatherings and events using powerful NLP and persuasion techniques.

Students will also become more confident and adapt relaxation techniques to achieve better results in future for their personal and professional growth.

It is ideal for people who are into sales and marketing and require persuasion skills and convincing power to grow in their job and business and achieve their targets.

This course contains a lot of hypnotic exercises and more than 35 minutes of live video content designed over 7 lectures in English.
title: NLP- Create Instant Rapport Using Hypnotic Handshake
